oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter of Mrs. S. F. O'Guin to J. A. Coble
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Mrs. S. F. O'Guin to her brother, J. A. Coble, concerning the death of their father, James Coble, during the Civil War. James Coble, 10th Tenn. Cav. (Forrest's) Regt., CSA, was the sole casualty in a skirmish near Jackson, Tenn., in December 1862. Coble's burial site remained unmarked and unknown to his family for 51 years.
